body:
Before i start, i just want to say that I am not used to the new website, so I do not know where to post this.
But anyways, A while ago I was banned for scamming because I did not give a rank account because something was wrong with my parents credit card. I was giving away an emerald rank. The person who won, said He would take gold because he heard of my problem. SINCE I bought both gold, AND emerald [I did not upgrade, I literally bought both], I would like to give my Gold rank away to him, and keep the emerald to myself since he bought both. I contacted Avigill, he said he would talk to funky, but I never got a response. I would like a Manager/Admin to talk to funky and ask if this is ok. If so, give my gold rank to Evocal. I was also told that I would be unbanned, once I give the rank out. Thank you for your time. if you need to, contact me Via skype at: AlexTheEpic99.

Have a nice day

~AlextheEpic99.
